w:r.w:t: % Use the independent variable x fx = % flow on the line % Symbolically: It is exact but only sometimes works Fpts1 = % use solve(??) for compute the fixed points % Numerically: Always works but it is not exact: double precision Fpts2 = % Use double(vpasolve(??))

% Guess a % Derivative: fxd = % Get Derivative of fx respect to x fxd_Fpts = subs(??,??,??) % Calculate derivative at Fixed Points disp('Stable Fixed Points:'); Fpts1(?<?) % Those Fixed Points with neg der disp('Instable Fixed Points:'); Fpts1(?>?) % Those Fixed Points with pos der % Exploring Neighbourhood epsilon = 1e-3; neigB = % [?-epsilon,? + epsilon] % Move Epsilon around the Fixed Points fx_M = % double(subs(??,??,??)) % compute flow around fixed points vec_neigB = diff(??,1,2) % Estimate the slope disp('Stable Fixed Points:'); stb = Fpts1(vec_neigB<0)% Those Fixed Points with neg slope disp('Instable Fixed Points:'); nstb = Fpts1(vec_neigB>0)% Those Fixed Points with neg eslope

xi = -?; xf = ?; % initial and final x points -4 to 4 xsmp = ?:?:? % Vector with setp 1e^-2 figure; hold on;grid on; plot(xsmp,zeros(size(xsmp)),'k'); % plot black line in x-axis where the flow is fplot(??,[??,??],'b'); % fx between xi,xf plot(?,zeros(size(??)),'o','MarkerFaceColor','r') % Plot filled circles fot stable fixed points plot(nstb,zeros(size(nstb)),'ro') % Plot non-circles fot stable fixed points rowPts = [-3,0,3] % points where a right/left marcker is going to be located xsmp_r = xsmp(subs(fx,x,xsmp)>0); % Get those points with positive flow xsmp_l = xsmp(subs(fx,x,xsmp)<0); % Get those points with negative flow plot(xsmp_r,zeros(size(xsmp_r)),'g');plot(-3,0,'>');plot(3,0,'>'); % plot positve in green plot(xsmp_l,zeros(size(xsmp_l)),'m');plot(0,0,'<'); % plot negative in magenta xlabel('x'); ylabel('dx'); grid on; title('Phase Portrait');
Trajectories using Numeric Runge-Kutta ODE45 method
